title: A Journey Through Time: Lima's Historic Center & Catacombs Tour
description: See the best that Peru‚Äôs capital, Lima, has to offer as you embark on a city sightseeing tour. Join a small group and visit important landmarks like the Park of Love, the Huaca Pucllana archaeological site, Plaza Mayor, and the Convent Museum of San Francisco. As you explore, your guide sheds light on the three historical periods of Lima‚Äîpre-Hispanic, colonial, and modern‚Äîas well as the cultural and gastronomic heritage.
all_descriptions: See the best that Peru‚Äôs capital, Lima, has to offer as you embark on a city sightseeing tour. Join a small group and visit important landmarks like the Park of Love, the Huaca Pucllana archaeological site, Plaza Mayor, and the Convent Museum of San Francisco. As you explore, your guide sheds light on the three historical periods of Lima‚Äîpre-Hispanic, colonial, and modern‚Äîas well as the cultural and gastronomic heritage.

ItineraryThis is a typical itinerary for this productStop At:El Parque del Amor, Malecon Cisneros 18, Lima PeruWe start our tour by picking up each traveler from their selected location. Depending on the option you choose at the time of booking, your pick-up time will be assigned accordingly. We offer pick-up from a designated meeting point, hotels in Miraflores, Barranco, and San Isidro, or directly from Jorge Ch√°vez International Airport. Please note that prices vary based on the selected pick-up option, so make sure to review this information carefully before completing your reservation.

First of all, you will visit one of the 50 most romantic parks in the world, located in the Miraflores neighborhood, known as the Parque del Amor, this park is a small and colorful refuge for couples in love, From here you have a magnificent view of the sea. It is inspired by the Park G√ºell in Barcelona and has in the central part a sculpture called "El Beso" by the Peruvian sculptor V√≠ctor Delf√≠n.Duration: 20 minutesStop At:Huaca Pucllana, Calle General Borgono s/n, cuadra 8, Lima 15074 PeruContinuing with our tour, you will visit the Huaca Pucllana Archaeological Site in a panoramic way, a sacred site belonging to the Lima culture.Duration: 20 minutesStop At:Plaza de Armas (Plaza Mayor), Jr. Junin and Jr. Carabaya, Lima PeruThen we will visit the historic center of Lima and walk through its main squares, streets, churches and shreds of the ancient city of the Kings.

Likewise, we will walk through the main square of Lima where our experienced guide will narrate the historical background of the old viceroyalty of Peru, we will appreciate the architectural monuments that surround the square, such as the cathedral of Lima, archiepiscopal palace, government palace.

As soon as we finish our walk through the historic center, you will visit the chocomuseum, a museum store where it shows us the history of chocolate and cocoa in Peru, we can also taste its typical liquors and jams made from chocolate and cocoa.Duration: 20 minutesStop At:Casa de la Literatura Peruana, Jr. Ancash 207 Centro Hist√≥rico de Lima, Lima PeruContinuing our walk we will observe the old abandoned station today converted into the house of Peruvian Literature, we will also be able to appreciate artisan shops and we will give you time so you can buy Peruvian crafts, after that you will visit an old colonial house today converted into a small traditional bar and In this place we will learn how to prepare the flagship drink of Peru ‚ÄúEl pisco Sour‚Äù.Duration: 20 minutesStop At:Museo Convento San Francisco y Catacumbas, Jiron Ancash, Lima 15001 PeruFinally we will enter the Convent, Museum of San Francisco and its catacombs, here we will have a guided tour for 30 minutes and we will visit some of the oldest cemeteries in the city located below the San Francisco convent, finally we will proceed to take you to your hotel and in If you want to stay for lunch or dinner in the center, the return is on your own account.Duration: 30 minutes

Love Park, Mal. Cisneros, Miraflores LIMA 18, PeruClients who choose the meeting point option for this tour will be picked up at Parque del Amor in Miraflores. One day before the tour, our team will contact you to confirm the exact pick-up time and share the details of your assigned guide, ensuring a smooth and well-organized experience.
End:This activity ends back at the meeting point.
